snippet.title: Furi - Announcement Trailer | PS4
snippet.description: Furi’s combat gameplay is designed with Japanese games in mind -- ultra fast-paced and responsive. Your character moves as soon as you send an input. Skills and reflexes are required to dodge and parry the enemies’ attacks. You beat your enemies by shooting like in a bullet hell shoot ’em up, and by swordfighting like in a samurai duel.
